animeTitle: Azur Lane: Bisoku Zenshin! Hokorashiki Bokou ni Shukusai wo
otherNames: アズールレーン びそくぜんしんっ! 誇らしき母港に祝祭を, : Azur Lane: Bisoku Zenshin Special, Azur Lane: Bisoku Zenshin Episode 13
synopsis: Javelin, Z23, Laffey, and Ayanami help Sirius practice as a maid for an upcoming party, while South Dakota and Massachusetts practice the piano.
